availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Richard Martin Haydock (Paducah, Kentucky, book keeper)

body.p: Paducah, Kentucky, book keeper. Kentucky native. Book keeper in Paducah 1860. Married to Elizabeth Watts Haydock in Livingston County, Kentucky on October 26, 1852. Father of Bitty and William Haydock. Clerk in Livingston County, Kentucky in 1850. Book keeper in Paducah, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Livingston, Smithland, p. 378B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken, Paducah, p. 873.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Livingston County Marriages, Film #000318176, p. 102.
Find A Grave, "Richard Martin Haydock (1830-1901)," Memorial #24971402. http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/24971402 (accessed July 11, 2019)
